      • getEvents

        @Value.Lazy
public Iterable<String> getEvents()
        Returns:
        Event names that are allowed to be serialized and logged to Scribe. Only explicitly specified events would be logged to prevent possible high traffic flow.

        Statuses that allow BuildRuleFinished events to be logged to Scribe. Will return a subset of https://fburl.com/m4o5p1mg
